description.name: PayPal
description.tagline: PayPal is the #1 most recognised and widely used payment gateway.
description.long: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept credit cards and PayPal online. Millions of users know and trust the PayPal payment solution online.
features: 3 Integration Methods to choose from: PayPal Website Payments Standard, PayPal Express Checkout & PayPal Website Payments Pro for merchant processing
